About

Da-Yea‚Äôs research focuses on unraveling the complexities of brain development in autism and its developmental trajectories through the integration of genetic, neuroimaging, and behavioral data. She is also dedicated to exploring the interplay between mental and physical health, with the aim of enhancing well-being in individuals and families affected by neurodevelopmental disorders.
